trans-unit.source: Provides the logic to establish a timer and to wait, asynchronously, for timer's expiration.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a lógica para estabelecer um temporizador e esperar, de forma assíncrona, a expiração do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When notified that its timer has expired, a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> completes its execution.
trans-unit.target: Quando for notificado de que o timer expirar, um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> conclui sua execução.

trans-unit.source: You can set a time out on the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> so that your workflow pauses before resuming execution.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir um tempo limite no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> para que o fluxo de trabalho faz uma pausa antes de continuar a execução.

trans-unit.source: You specify the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> using <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Especificar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> usando <xref:System.TimeSpan>.

trans-unit.source: This causes your workflow to pause until the specified <xref:System.TimeSpan> has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que o fluxo de trabalho Pausar especificado <xref:System.TimeSpan> expirou.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class runs the code method associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> event before the activity starts and the code-beside method can be used to initialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> classe executa o método de código associado a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> evento antes do início da atividade e o método ao lado do código pode ser usado para inicializar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> is guaranteed to complete no sooner than the indicated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> é garantido para ser concluída sem antes que o indicado <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The delay can take longer because the timer notification might occur some time after the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> is reached.
trans-unit.target: O atraso pode levar mais tempo porque a notificação de timer pode ocorrer algum tempo após o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> for atingido.

trans-unit.source: One reason for a longer delay is if the workflow is running under high system stress in a server environment.
trans-unit.target: Um motivo para um atraso mais longo é se o fluxo de trabalho está sendo executado na sobrecarga do sistema de alta em um ambiente de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Simple State Machine.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte simples máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the time-out duration starts.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes do início da duração do tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: This event should not be used to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não deve ser usado para definir o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> para um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The time-out duration should be set in the workflow's `InitializeComponent` method instead.
trans-unit.target: A duração do tempo limite deve ser definida no fluxo de trabalho `InitializeComponent` método em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que destina-se ao evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the workflow queue that will be delivered when the timer expires.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho que será entregue quando o temporizador expirar.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue is set by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho é definido <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> que representa o ambiente de execução do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> para o evento pai.

trans-unit.source: Creates the subscription of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> to an event.
trans-unit.target: Cria a assinatura do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> a um evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentContext" /> or <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentContext" /> ou <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> que representa o ambiente de execução do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> para o evento pai.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the subscription of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> to an event.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a assinatura do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> a um evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentContext" /> or <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentContext" /> ou <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que gerencie o evento.

trans-unit.source: The previously typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento com tipo anterior.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Define o procedimento de processamento quando o evento subscribed-to ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the duration of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define a duração do atraso no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the length of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que indica o tempo de atraso no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The time period set in this property determines the time the workflow will sit idle before the workflow proceeds to the next activity.
trans-unit.target: O período de tempo definido nessa propriedade determina a hora em que o fluxo de trabalho ficará ocioso antes que o fluxo de trabalho prossiga para a próxima atividade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property to 3 seconds.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como definir o valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> propriedade em 3 segundos.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that `delay2` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Esse código supõe que `delay2` é do tipo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDurationProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDurationProperty> campo.
